author: hlship
msg: Allow HiveMind variable references inside OGNL expressions.
Allow <set> and <set-expression> to provide the value or expression in the body of the element.
Add IInitializeService interface, to allow core implementations to initialize once configured.

author: hlship
msg: Allow runtime variables inside the <value> and <set> elements.
Finish documenting the HiveMind module deployment descriptor.

author: hlship
msg: Fix minor formatting error caused by adding licences.

author: hlship
msg: Add in a bunch of new features and tests.
Put Jakarta Commons license on all the source code.
